Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the actions of Russia by stating that they unleashed more than 500 lions on the streets to ensure people stay indoors during the pandemic.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Russian President Vladimir Putin has not resorted to releasing lions to keep people inside during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Russia has actually released lions for this purpose.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Russia would use such extreme measures to enforce stay-at-home orders without providing any credible evidence.
Understate: There is no evidence to suggest that the claim understates any aspect of the situation.
Exist alternative explanation: The alternative explanation is that the claim is false and based on a fabricated news screenshot and a photo from a movie shoot in South Africa.
